Huffman Codes are: 
c 11111
e 111101
h 111100
o 1110
m 1101
n 1100
a 101
s 1001
i 001
t 0000
H 01100
u 00011
p 00010
r 0100
g 1000
d 0101
l 01101
f 0111

The original string is:

Huffmancodingisadatacompressionalgorithm

The encoded string is:
01100000110111011111011011100111111110010100111001000001100110101011010000101111111110110100010010011110110011001001111011001010110110001110010000100001111001101

The decoded string is:

Huffmancodingisadatacompressionalgorithm
